refnamediv.refpurpose: Secure SOAP Client using Username and Password for signing

refsect1.title: Example

itemizedlist.listitem: This example demonstrates how to make signed SOAP message.
The signed message contains Username and password in the Security header.
In that example no encrypted data is sent.
The server checks credentials against database users and ensures it's validity.

refsect1.para: To run .NET client using Username signed message, against Virtuoso service you need:

itemizedlist.listitem: Edit the Makefile and specify in CSLIBFLAGS where Microsoft.Web.Services.DLL resides.
compile the example issuing nmake command in the tutorial/services/ws_s_4a directory.
